name: homepage
description: Homepage project with React frontend and FastAPI backend

scripts.test: concurrently "npm run test:backend" "npm run test:frontend" "npm run test:extension"
scripts.test:backend: cd backend && venv\Scripts\python.exe -m unittest discover -s tests -p "test_*.py"
scripts.install: concurrently "npm run install:backend" "npm run install:frontend" "npm run install:extension"
scripts.install:backend: cd backend && venv\Scripts\python.exe -m pip install -r requirements.txt
